function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Exclusion of young people and women from initiatives","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective partnerships between global, regional, national, and local governments, the private sector, and civil society.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interrelationship between different sustainable development goals sdgs , where the consequences of one sdg may impact another.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deficit of international solidarity in response to the pandemic, particularly affecting developing countries.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of decent housing, running water, proper sanitation, and waste management systems in slum areas,
